channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Liko, Mollie and their Pok?mon set out to save a Tandemaus pair separated by a storm.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Taffy
channel.desc: Every time Bentley steals Taffy?s bow, Taffy seems to find another one from nowhere. Bentley tries to find the source of his supply so that he can destroy it and finally expose Taffy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: The Aronnax and Alpheus?s sub are trapped within a giant jellyfish! They?ve been eaten and the jellyfish won?t let food out.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Pieface steals Professor Von Screwtop's Pastry-based Intelligent Espionage unit (PIE) after forming a strong bond with the pie-shaped robot. Pieface is dismayed when Walter steals it from him to protect his dad from the embarrassing footage the PIE's memory chip holds.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse's plan to hold a surprise party for Professor Squawkencluck is undone when the Baron releases killer birthday presents into the world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A fairy-tale princess being pestered by an annoying prince orders a new dragon from the Ninjas, who return with the most ferocious monster of them all - a T-Rex.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. A circus sets up in a nearby field, and a spellbound Timmy wanders off to investigate. Can Shaun rescue him before the farmer notices he's gone.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, but the electricity supply stops in the log cabin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When the kids think that Mom may be pregnant, they set out to prove they will be great babysitters. Along the way, they learn that it's much harder to do it alone than it is together.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are excited to visit Whizzpop?s Pop-Up Bakery and taste his magical cakes, but they are shocked to find that the protein bars have shouty raisins in them, the custard tarts are rock hard, and the floating sponges keep floating away! Trevor quests to solve the mystery, but having accidentally fallen into Whizzpop?s invisibility flour, how on earth will he get everyone?s attention.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The agents must come together to battle a common enemy. Curriculum: Charts, line graphs. Data Analysis and Collection.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The agents must come together to battle a common enemy. Curriculum: Charts, line graphs. Data Analysis and Collection.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Challenges, celebrities, makes and adventures with the Blue Peter team.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir unknowingly face Queen Mayor.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: After 100 years, the secrets of Laqua finally come to light.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Just as the Scions start coming into their own, harnessing their potential as a team, all their hard-won progress comes to a halt when they attempt the ultimate Scion ability: Fusion. The unexpected outcome endangers both Carter and Myridell while giving Graven another strategic advantage.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Kenzie helps Pete make a difficult decision. The Brawl?s love theme gets in the way of Heath and Daisy fixing their friendship, and Michelle turns to Eldon for Brawl advice.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: Legend of the Boneknapper Dragon
channel.desc: Animated short. When Gobber's house burns down, the old Viking is convinced that his nemesis, the legendary Boneknapper dragon, is responsible. Bent on revenge, Gobber resolves to hunt it down once and for all, despite the fact that no one believes the dragon exists. Regardless, Hiccup and the gang decide to accompany him for his own good. On the sea voyage, Gobber tells the story of his rivalry with the beast, which gets sillier with each episode. When the gang find themselves shipwrecked on the suspected island of the beast, they finally learn the truth about the dragon.
